description: For Ricky's second shooting we rented a Suite in Montreal. As we entered it, we noticed that the shower had a stripper's pole and was surrounded by glass so we decided to shoot a shower scene. The water dripping down on Ricky's smooth muscular body and huge 9 incher made this production one of my favorite to date. Ricky at his best and now remastered !
title: Ricky's Shower Scene, Scene #01
